definitions.title: coll.
definitions.body: articles of exchange, merchandise (only of Tyre, Ez Eze 27);—sf. [[מַעֲרָבֵךְ]] v:Eze 27:13, v:Eze 27:17, v:Eze 27:19, v:Eze 27:25, v:Eze 27:27 a, v:Eze 27:34; as acc. cogn. c. [[עָרַב]] v:Eze 27:9, v:Eze 27:27; pl. sf. [[מַעֲרָבַיִךְ]] v:Eze 27:33 perh. thy (diverse) wares (DHM:VOJ viii (1894), 4 prop., ingeniously, meaning imports, deriving fr. V. [[ערב]] enter, but improb.).
